description:
Elevate your daily routine with a backpack that pays attention to the little things. With the Rhune, your everyday essentials are not only secure but also effortlessly accessible. Plus, all fabrics are made from recycled content, and it features moisture-wicking properties to keep you cool and collected throughout the day.

  • Durable, recycled 300D ripstop polyester with a DWR finish means you can worry less about the bag and more on the journey. AirCushion foamless backpanel provides breathability and eliminates pressure points. Digi harness pocket fits earbuds, transit passes, and other daily essentials and keeps them secure and easy to access. Padded, contoured shoulder harness with removable sternum strap. Large panel loading zippered access to main compartment. Externally padded laptop sleeve fits laptops up to 15in. Front zippered compartment with interior mesh pockets. Top zippered quick-access pocket. Side exterior, swing-around-access stash pocket with key clip. Side stretch-mesh bottle pocket. Front reflective attachment loops keep you visible. Custom ComfortGrip zipper pulls are easy to use with gloves
name: Gregory Rhune 22 Backpack - Unisex
